snippet.title: The Cub Announcement Trailer | PC, PlayStation, Switch, Xbox
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1941410

The Jungle Book meets the armageddon. The Cub is a story-rich, old-school tough platformer inspired by SEGA classics but built for today. Platform parkour through the remains of humanity as smooth apocalypse-wave tunes and stories reveal more. Created by the minds behind Golf Club: Wasteland to further the stories from the wasteland of tomorrow.

Coming to PC, PS4, PS5 , Xbox One, and Nintendo Switch.

To keep up with Untold Tales and The Cub, use the following links: 

Website: https://untoldtales.games/ 
Facebook: https://facebook.com/untoldtalesgames 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/untoldtalesHQ
